additional_notes: The document appears to be a scanned copy of two Official Count Slips from the Metropolitan Correctional Center, dated August 9, 2019. The slips contain handwritten information, including unit numbers, counts, and times. Some fields are redacted with '(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)' and '(b)(7)(F)'.
